title: Supporting student nurses by the educational use of self: A hermeneutic phenomenological exploration of the mentor experience
excerpt: This thesis reports on a study of the lived experience of clinical nurses as mentors of student nurses in the workplace. Pre-registration nurse education, in which students must spend fifty percent of their time in practice, relies on a partnership between universities and health  ...
